It came into effect on January 1, 2013. This was by merging the districts of Bruck an der Mur and Mürzzuschlag.steiermark.orf.at, Weitere Bezirksfusionen: Aus 6 werden 3 It has the following 19 municipalities:"beitrag/11530440". bh-bruck-muerzzuschlag.steiermark.at.
